---

## Usage Instructions

1. Copy the template above for significant commits
2. Fill in all relevant sections
3. Post as a comment on related issues
4. Attach to PR description if applicable

## When to Use

Use this template for commits that:
- Complete a significant portion of a feature
- Fix critical bugs
- Add substantial test coverage
- Update major documentation
- Change project infrastructure

For minor commits (typo fixes, small refactors), this template is not necessary.
